articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: ‘Baldur’s Gate 3’ Prepared For 100,000 Concurrent Players, They’ve Gotten 700,000 - Forbes
articles.description: Larian’s Swen Vincke posted a tweet yesterday showing the game hitting 500,000 concurrent players, making it the third most played game on all of Steam He said that he told IT to only expect 100,000 concurrents at max.
articles.content:
Baldur's Gate 3
Larian
I am running out of ways to describe not just what a success Baldurs Gate 3 is, but on a scale that no one, not even its developer Larian, predicted.
Larians Swen Vincke pos… [+2181 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Fahey
articles.title: Huge 30-mile heat blob spotted on dark side of the moon has scientists concerned - The Mirror
articles.description: The heat spot is a suspected patch of radiation after scientists discovered a 31-mile mass of granite deep below the Moon's surface, suggesting it came from a once-active volcano
articles.content:
An enormous heat blob is bulging on the dark side of the Moon and sparking scientists' fears.
The worrying mass of heat - which is believed to have been caused by radiation - has been detected in an… [+2033 chars]

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Chandrayaan-3: Historic India mission enters Moon orbit, aiming for south pole - BBC
articles.description: If Chandrayaan-3 succeeds, India will be the first country to land near the Moon's little-explored south pole.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: The moment India launched historic Moon mission
Chandrayaan-3, India's latest Moon mission, has entered the lunar orbit, the country's space agency has said.
